Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My teacher is able to give me more direct and targeted feedback as they are the ones who know the content, however GENAI is able to give me ways to improve my writing rather than focusing on the content.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: My teacher focused on more of the content whereas GENAI focused on the way i was writing and how i could improve on the words in the text.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: My teacher was able to give me credential work to help me improve whereas GENAI i had to make sure it was not some fake website, which took me a long tie.
